name: Tashigi
text:
Opponent's Turn: If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may rest 1 of your cards instead.
Activate: Main Once Per Turn: You may rest 2 of your cards: This Character gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

effect.text: If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may rest 1 of your cards instead.
You may rest 2 of your cards: This Character gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

powerMod.duration: until the end of your opponent's next End Phase
